T02D2961:44a-0: @44a * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2961:44a-1: bden pa yang dag pa'i mtshan rtogs par byed pa /
T02D2961:44a-2: pra se na sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa po
T02D2961:44a-3: dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun
T02D2961:44a-4: par mandal la sogs pa sngon du bya ba'i rim
T02D2961:44a-6: rin po che'i bum pa mdzes pa la kha dog dkar por bsgyur te /
T02D2961:44a-7: de nyid kyi nang du bum pa shis pa'i rdzas rnams kyis btab la /
T02D2961:44a-8: kha rgyan la sogs pa mdzes pa'i chas dang ldan par bya zheng /
T02D2961:44a-9: rma bya dang me long chag pa dang gas pa la sogs pa'i skyon med pa dang /
T02D2961:44a-10: mda' dkar mo la bya rgod kyi mig g-yas pa
T02D2961:44a-11: dar dkar po'i ldeb tu phur la btags la de
T02D2961:44a-12: dag rnams bum pa'i steng du bzhag la dar dkar
T02D2961:44a-13: po dri ma med pas yol ba bres te /
T02D2961:44a-14: spos la sogs pa dri zhim pa rnams kyi chag chag gis gnas khang kun du btab ste /
T02D2961:44a-15: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02D2961:44a-16: ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2961:44a-17: me long dang mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2961:44a-18: ye shes bstim pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2961:44a-19: khro bo de nyid kyi snying ga nas 'od 'phros
T02D2961:44a-20: pas sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spyan drangs te
T02D2961:44a-22: buddha re re'i sbyan la lha mo dkar mo lag
T02D2961:44a-23: na me long dang bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs pa
T02D2961:44a-24: dpag tu med pa byung ste /
T02D2961:44a-25: sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyi mig la bstims pas
T02D2961:44a-26: sangs rgyas de nyid kyi zhing khams dpag tu med
T02D2961:44a-27: pa mthong ba la blo yis mos pa byas pas
T02D2961:44a-28: rdo rje'i mig dang ldan par gyur te /
T02D2961:44a-29: me long gi nang du yang gang yin pa'i gzugs dang /
T02D2961:44a-30: bden pa'i mtshan nyid ston par 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
T02D2961:44a-31: de la yar ngo'i tshes brgyad kyi tshe snga dro gos gsar pa dri ma med pa gyon la /
T02D2961:44a-32: 'di ltar sngags 'di lan stong bzlas te /
T02D2961:44a-33: bum pa'i chus bdag nyid kyi mig g-yas pa la
T02D2961:44a-34: sngags re bzlas shing bkrus na rdo rje'i mig dang
T02D2961:44a-37: aom ka ta badzra bra mo tra na ya h'um
T02D2961:44a-38: h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes chog rdzogs pa lan
T02D2961:44a-39: bdun byas na / bden pa'i tshig nyid 'jig rten
T02D2961:44a-40: ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phyin
T02D2961:44b-0: ci ma log par mthong par @44b 'gyur ba la
T02D2961:44b-2: 'di dag la yang mi rung ba'i sgrub pa chang la sogs pa bdun spangs te /
T02D2961:44b-4: rgyud kyi bden pa'i don nges par sgrub pa //
